TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void AutomationFocusChangedEventHandler(object sender, AutomationFocusChangedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed AutomationFocusChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.param: The object that raised the event.
Docs.summary: Represents the method implemented by the UI Automation client application to handle the event raised by a UI Automation provider when the focus has changed.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use an AutomationFocusChangedEventHandler delegate to define the method that is called by a client to handle [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] focus-changed events.
The <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> represented by `sender` might not have any cached properties or patterns, depending on whether the application subscribed to this event while a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> was active.
## Examples The following example implements a delegate to handle focus-changed events.
[!code-cs[UIAFocusTracker_snip#106](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/FocusTracker/FocusTracker.cs#106)] [!code-vb[UIAFocusTracker_snip#106](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/FocusTrackerVB/FocusTracker.vb#106)]
